summary: The Rural Veterinary Workforce Act aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude assistance provided to participants in veterinary student loan repayment or forgiveness programs from taxable income. The bill specifically references programs under the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 and similar state-level programs designed to improve access to veterinary services, effective for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
